caption:
“The kingdom is nearer than we think.”

Reflection:
Heaven leans close — in every act of mercy, every quiet prayer. The eternal brushes against the everyday.

Commentary:
This line reminds us that God’s reign begins within hearts, not thrones. The kingdom is not far off; it’s already unfolding among us.
